General.Name: Dalian Zeus Entertainment
General.Description: Tianyu Digital Technology (Dalian) Group Co., Ltd. engages in the e-sport games and data traffic businesses in China. The company develops and operates online games, including web online games and mobile online games. It is also involved in the provision of internet and mobile internet advertising services. In addition, the company develops and operates mobile application distribution platforms; and offers technical consulting services. The company was formerly known as Dalian Zeus Entertainment Co., Ltd. Tianyu Digital Technology (Dalian) Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.
